derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French annexer, from Latin annectere 'connect', from ad- 'to' + nectere 'tie, fasten'

entry.def: If a country annexes another country or an area of land, it seizes it and takes control of it.

example.ex: Rome annexed the Nabatean kingdom in 106 AD...
example.tran: 公元106年罗马吞并了纳巴泰王国。

example.ex: Hitler was determined to annex Austria to Germany.
example.tran: 希特勒决定将奥地利并入德国。

means.word_mean: 1. an addition that extends a main building

sentences.sentence: "The Israelis are annexing more and more territory on the West Bank"

auth_sentence.content: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.

auth_sentence.content: Nor had Piedmont planned to annex the whole peninsula.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor had Piedmont planned to annex the whole peninsula.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor had Piedmont planned to annex the whole peninsula.

auth_sentence.content: Historically, it might as well have been an annex.
auth_sentence.res_content: Historically, it might as well have been an annex.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下一个[的]，接下来[的];隔壁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: nex连接,邻近+t→adj.&n.下一个[的]，接下来[的];隔壁的
con共同+nex连接,邻近+ion表名词→共同连接→亲戚关系
nex连接,邻近+us→n.[看法等的]连系,连结
an增加+nex连接,邻近→加上连接→附加

means.word_mean: 并吞, 兼并, 霸占(领土、小国等)

sentences.en: Britain annexed this small island in 1955.
sentences.cn: 英国于1955年吞并了这个小岛。

jushi.english: A plagiarist annexes the ideas of others.
jushi.chinese: 剽窃者窃取他人的文思构想。

jushi.english: In 1521 the state fell to Cortes, and Mexico was annexed by Spain.
jushi.chinese: 1521年,这个国家落到科尔特斯手中,墨西哥被西班牙强行占领了。

jushi.english: Britain annexed this small island west of Scotland in 1955.
jushi.chinese: 英国于1955年并吞了苏格兰以西的这个小岛。
